title: Classic 3/4th Sleeve Cotton Kurti
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a women's kurti with 3/4th sleeves, straight silhouette, made from lightweight cotton fabric, solid dusty rose color, round neckline, hip-length, minimal trims, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and clean finishing, no model, no mannequin, no human elements.
techpack: Lightweight cotton kurti with 3/4th sleeves, straight silhouette, round neckline with contrast piping, side slits for ease of movement, single button keyhole closure at back. Seam allowances 1cm, overlocked internal seams, double-stitched hems.
provenance: Inspired by trending 3/4th sleeve styles in contemporary ethnic wear; adapted for commercial production with breathable cotton and minimal trims.
design_text:
Classic 3/4th Sleeve Cotton Kurti (DSN-3QSLV-001)
Colors: Dusty Rose, Soft Beige, Warm White
Fabrics: 100% Cotton
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: Kurti
Silhouette: Straight
Sleeves: 3/4th sleeves
Neckline: Round
Length: Hip-length
Style / Fit: R, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: Side slits, Contrast piping at neckline, Single button keyhole at back
Techpack: available
